rows.label: qev086808_MSG0001
rows.name:
Man oh man... I can't believe you actually
went out there on your lonesome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0002
rows.name:
Thankfully, I had Rock's assistance,
not to mention Elma and the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0003
rows.name: Look, I heard Elma's report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0004
rows.name:
She told me about how you found 
that selenean sage all by yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0005
rows.name: So...this mean Celica passed BLADE test?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0006
rows.name: Sure does! With flying colors![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0007
rows.name: Yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0008
rows.name: Congratulations, Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0009
rows.name:
Thank you. But...what does this mean for Rock?
Can he stay too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hm? Well, since he's a BLADE's family member,
I don't see why not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0011
rows.name:
Those Ganglion scumbags are
gonna be after us either way, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0012
rows.name: I fear the matter isn't so simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's premature to say there is no chance
of peace with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0014
rows.name: We can't assume needless risk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0015
rows.name: What...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0016
rows.name:
But if you were to prove yourself an asset to New LA,
it would be different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0017
rows.name: Oh, come on! How many times do we have to go over this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0017_02
rows.name: Rock! Isn't! FIGHTING![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_JNK0010
rows.name: Surrender

rows.label: qev086808_SEL0011
rows.name:
Concede that there's no other
option but for Rock to fight.

rows.label: qev086808_JNK0020
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev086808_SEL0021
rows.name: Say Rock will only fight over your dead body.

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0018
rows.name: How can you say that?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0019
rows.name: That doesn't sound like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0020
rows.name: Tatsu ashamed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0021
rows.name: Fighting? Who said anything about fighting?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0022
rows.name:
The costs of training someone with his
belief system far outweigh the benefits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0023
rows.name: Huh? Then what...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh? Is this the point where you offer to fight in his place?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0025
rows.name: No. I won't have anyone getting hurt for me again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0026
rows.name: It scares me, but...I'll fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0027
rows.name: A noble offer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0028
rows.name:
But productivity demands we all work
in fields suited to our aptitudes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0029
rows.name: Huh? Then what...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0030
rows.name:
Right now, we have a severe shortage of
heavy construction machinery here in NLA.

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0031
rows.name:
I could offer a gentleman of your strength
very favorable employment terms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0032
rows.name: Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0033
rows.name: But you still have the right to choose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0034
rows.name:
You're free to contribute to building our city,
or you can find a home elsewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0035
rows.name: Are you saying I can help without fighting?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0036
rows.name: I am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0037
rows.name: Then I'll do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0038
rows.name: That's wonderful, Rock![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0039
rows.name:
Bah! I knew you were up to something
with all that sneakin' and skulkin' around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0040
rows.name: I do not "skulk," Jack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0041
rows.name: I was simply making the necessary preparations, as one must.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0042
rows.name: Yeah, yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0043
rows.name: Careful, you'll make him blush.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_JNK0030
rows.name: Apologize

rows.label: qev086808_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Chausson you pegged him wrong.

rows.label: qev086808_JNK0040
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: qev086808_SEL0041
rows.name: Give Chausson a knowing nod.

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0044
rows.name: So did I, Director General. I'm sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0045
rows.name: Oh, come now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0046
rows.name:
You were just doing your job to help New LA,
and I kept jumping to conclusions...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0047
rows.name: Think nothing of it. All's well that ends well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0048
rows.name: Cheers to you, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0049
rows.name:
Tatsu was wrong about suit man.
Suit man is good friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0050
rows.name: What ARE you going on about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0051
rows.name: Now he IS blushing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0052
rows.name: If you'll excuse me, I have work to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0053
rows.name:
Maybe under all that bluster,
he's just a big softy looking for a hug.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086808_MSG0054
rows.name: Huh?![ST:wait ]
